About the same as Torion, I'd say.
that belongs to that old fart...
Is that a compliment or something!?
You've done well to come all this way!
You came out of nowhere as always, huh.
Alright, Tyvar, we came by to fetch
So you're not here to enjoy my star to the fullest?
The Mana Vessel's an objective, yes,
but our main purpose is a fun adventure.
I see, that's good and well!
might as well ask for the Mana Vessel now.
...Nope, you can come get it yourself!
I'll be waiting in the planet's deepest layer!
Why are you being so difficult, man?
That'll certainly make for an exciting trip.
It's more rewarding to get what you wanted
after a long day of hard work!
You guys really seem to get along...
When you say the deepest layer,
you meant the Wind Furnace, right?
Fiede, you know a lot about Virea, don't you!
Did you hear that from Tahati?
As Fiede said, in the deepest layer of this star
Or rather, the Wind Furnace itself is the deepest layer.
To get there, you just have to go down and down,
but various obstacles will impede you!
Overcome them and reach your destination!

Anyone can enter if they really wanted to.
However, they will be recognized as third-class
anti-order forces and will be subject to
surveillance, and their annihilation will be
recommended depending on the situation at hand.
In the upper layer, you can enjoy interacting with
the various residents in that layer.
However, misbehaving may result in annihilation.

Not unless you are a resident.
There are 2885 related regulations in this matter.
Shall I explain them one by one?
So, what'd happen if... for example,
we repel those who tried to annihilate us?
You'll be chased after until you are annihilated.

We only protect the upper layer.

than we expected, we'll retreat immediately.
